LanguageData.Fluffy.BackupPower.PlaceWorker.PlaceOnPo: must be placed on a power generator
LanguageData.Fluffy.BackupPower.PlaceWorker.PlaceOnFl: must be placed on a generator that can be turned on and off
LanguageData.Fluffy.BackupPower.PlaceWorker.OnlyOneAt: only one backup power controller is allowed per generator
LanguageData.Fluffy.BackupPower.Settings.UpdateInterv: The interval with which backup power needs are re-calculated. Shorter intervals means less wastage of resources, but may cause some lag.
LanguageData.Fluffy.BackupPower.Settings.MinimumOnTim: The minimum time generators will stay active when activated. Shorter times are more efficient, but may lead to generators 'flickering' on and off.
LanguageData.Fluffy.BackupPower.AttachmentDestroyedBe: Backup power control box destroyed because the {0} it was attached to was destroyed.
LanguageData.Fluffy.BackupPower.RunOnBatteriesOnly.De: If enabled, the backup power control unit will turn off when batteries are sufficiently full. \nIf disabled, the backup power control unit will only turn off when batteries are sufficiently full AND the current power production exceeds demand.
